channel.title: Music – James Morrison
channel.description: Recent content in James Morrison on Music

item.title: James Morrison - You Give Me Something
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 61520

You want to stay
with me in the morning
You only hold me
when I sleep
I was meant
to tread the water
But now I’ve gotten
in too deep
For every piece of me
that wants you uhm uhm
Another piece
backs away
‘Cause you give me
something
That makes me
scared alright
This could be
nothing
But I’m willing
to give it a try
Please give me
something
‘Cause someday
I might know my heart
You already waited up
for hours
Just to spend
a little time
Alone with me yeah uhm
and I can say
I’ve never bought you
flowers uhm uhm
I can’t work out
what the mean
I never thought that
I’d love someone uhm
That was someone
else’s dream
‘Cause you give me
something
That makes me
scared alright
This could be
nothing
But I’m willing
to give it a try
Please give me
something
‘Cause someday
I might call you
From my heart
but it might me
A second too late
and the words
I could
never say
Gonna come out
anyway ah oh uhm
‘Cause you give me
something
That makes me
scared alright
This could be
nothing
But I’m willing
to give it a try
Please give me
something uhm
‘Cause you give me
something
That makes me
scared alright
This could be
nothing
But I’m willing
to give it a try
Please give me
something
‘Cause someday
I might know my heart
Know my heart
know my heart
Know my heart
uhm~

item.title: James Morrison - I Won't Let You Go
item.description:
작곡: Martin.., James Morrison / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 79041

When it’s
black
Take a little time to
hold yourself
Take a little time to
feel around
Before
it’s gone
You won’t
let go
But you still
keep falling down
Remember how you
saved me now
From all of
my wrongs
And if there’s love
just feel it
And if there’s light
we’ll see it
This is no time to
be alone alone yeah
I won’t
let you go
Say those words
say those words
Like there’s
nothing else
Close your eyes and
you might believe that
There is
some way out
Open up open up your
heart to me now
Let it all
come pouring out
There’s nothing
I can’t take
And if there’s love
just feel it
And if there’s light
we’ll see it
This is no time to
be alone alone yeah
I won’t
let you go
If you
sky is falling
Just take my hand and
hold it
You don’t have to
be alone alone yeah
I won’t
let you go
And if you feel the
fading of the light
When you’re too weak
to carry on the fight
And all
your friends
That you count
have disappeared
I’ll be here now gone
forever holding on
And if there’s love
just feel it
And if there’s light
we’ll see it
This is no time to
be alone alone yeah
I won’t
let you go
If you
sky is falling
Just take my hand and
hold it
You don’t have to
be alone alone yeah
I won’t
let you go
I won’t let you go
I won’t let you go
I won’t let you go
no I won’t let you go
